# font

**Instance Property**

The font for the badge text.

## Declaration

```swift
var font: UIFont { get set }
```

## Customizing Content

- **color**: The color of the badge text.
- **backgroundColor**: The background tint color of the badge.
- **transform**: The transform to apply to the text before displaying it.
- **TVMediaItemContentConfiguration.TextProperties.TextTransform**: Constants that specify the transform to apply to the text.
